REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2739 reute h f BC-TOFRUZEN-<YUMYC>-TO-R 03-19 0039

TEXT.TITLE: TOFRUZEN <YUMYC> TO REMAIN LISTED ON NASDAQ
TEXT.BODY: Tofruzen Inc said it received an exception to the NASD's asset requirement, allowing its units, common stock and warrants to remain listed on the NASDAQ system. Reuter
